name: plume-fossil
effect: Give to a scientist in a museum to receive an archen.
short_effect: Can be revived into an archen.

flavor_text.black_white: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that flew in the sky in ancient times. It appears to be part of its wing.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that flew in the sky in ancient times. It appears to be part of its wing.
